member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.DepthEnable
member.summary: A Boolean value that enables depth testing. The default value is TRUE.

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.DepthWriteMask
member.summary: A member of the enumerated type that identifies a portion of the depth-stencil buffer that can be modified by depth data. The default value is D3D10_DEPTH_WRITE_MASK_ALL.

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.DepthFunc
member.summary: A member of the enumerated type that defines how depth data is compared against existing depth data. The default value is D3D10_COMPARISON_LESS

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.StencilEnable
member.summary: A Boolean value that enables stencil testing. The default value is FALSE.

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.StencilReadMask
member.summary: A value that identifies a portion of the depth-stencil buffer for reading stencil data. The default value is D3D10_DEFAULT_STENCIL_READ_MASK.

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.StencilWriteMask
member.summary: A value that identifies a portion of the depth-stencil buffer for writing stencil data. The default value is D3D10_DEFAULT_STENCIL_WRITE_MASK.

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.FrontFace
member.summary: A structure that identifies how to use the results of the depth test and the stencil test for pixels whose surface normal is facing toward the camera.

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.BackFace
member.summary: A structure that identifies how to use the results of the depth test and the stencil test for pixels whose surface normal is facing away from the camera.
